text: SHATTERED Ariana Grande was “ praying for Manchester ” yesterday following the deadly suicide attack at the end of her concert. The singer was consoled by her boyfriend Mac Miller as she returned to the US after the suicide bombing at her concert in Manchester on Monday night. Splash News / Backgrid 16 Ariana Grande has been reunited with her boyfriend Mac Miller after the Manchester attack The pop star was spotted for the first time since 22 gig - goers were killed at the Manchester Arena, prompting her to postpone the rest of her world tour. After the atrocity, Ariana, 23, quit Britain and flew back to the US with her mum Joan, who accompanied her on tour. She was pictured getting off the private plane in Florida and walking down the steps into the arms of her rapper boyfriend Mac
